A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson crapped all over the Star Wars franchise and made a piece of trash. The movie is horrible. I like how he brought back JarJarBinks with #BenicioBinks. Even worse\, reminiscent of 30 mins of wasted film with the pod-racing of The Phantom Menace... 30 mins of wasted film with dear-horse racing through a casino. Yeah\, what a giant waste of time that was. Finn and Rose apparently are indestructible. Rian Johnson should lose his job as a director after the junk he wrote and directed with The Last Jedi. Really.. a 'your-mom' joke?! I had such high hopes for this movie after The Force Awakens\, but Rian Johnson... you suck as a movie writer and as a director. You ruined this movie and have scarred a huge franchise.\n\nIt was bad enough what George Lucas had done with Episodes 1\,2\,3. Holy crap those were bad. Then you get a little hope with the Force Awakens and JJ Abrams. Then.. the Dark Side settles upon the Rebellion in the name of: Darth Rian Johnson...
